title: The Unintended: R u sure??
description: A story of two ages where women in both time periods are faced with difficult personal decisions due to unwanted and untimely circumstances in their lives. Their decisions are conflicted due to changing social and religious biases, but are finally made in order to protect themselves and others whom they care about deeply. In the process they ironically find themselves deceiving those that they care for and trust the most. As a consequence of their decisions unanticipated personal challenges and unintended effects on future lives ensue.
author: JAKe Hatmacher
